data.name: ArbitrationRequest1
data.value: If you have not found an amicable agreement with the opposing party you can then apply for arbitration.

data.name: ArbitrationRequest2
data.value: The center will take charge of your dispute and appoint an arbitrator in charge.

data.name: BeforeStarting
data.value: Before you begin, here is the procedure as it will unfold.

data.name: ChallengeInfo1
data.value: During your challenging of your opponent's declarations, we will first ask you to confirm the contact information that has been given to us about you, or to modify or add to it if necessary.
data.comment: Lors de votre contestation, nous allons tout d'abord vous demander de confirmer les informations de contact qui nous ont été transmises à votre sujet, ou de les modifier ou compléter si nécessaire.

data.name: ChallengeInfo2
data.value: You can then give your version of the facts by challenging your opponent's statement.
data.comment: Vous pourrez ensuite donner votre version des faits en écrivant votre contestation sur la déclaration de votre adversaire.

data.name: ChallengeInfo3
data.value: Once you have written your own statement, you will have the possibility to challenge each fact or document provided by the opposing party, as well as to add facts and document that you think are important to prove your point.
data.comment: Une fois votre propre déclaration écrite, vous aurez l'occasion de contester chaque fait ou pièce fourni par la partie adverse, ainsi qu'ajouter les faits et pièces qui vous semblent importants pour prouver vos dires.

data.name: ChallengeInfo4
data.value: Your challenge of the case finished, you will have the possibility to formulate your own claims.
data.comment: Vos contestations apports personnels au dossier terminés, vous aurez la possibilité de faire vos propres demandes. ????

data.name: ChallengeInfo5
data.value: Finally, after having confirmed to us that you do or do not have an arbitration clause, your file will be finished and you will be able to review the summary of the case and your information.
data.comment: Enfin, après nous avoir confirmer que vous avez ou pas une clause compromissoire, votre dossier sera terminé et vous pourrez revoir le résumé du dossier complété de vos informations.

data.name: ChallengeInfo6
data.value: One last thing left to do: find an amicable agreement for this dispute and end it, or formulate an arbitration request.
data.comment: Plus qu'une chose à faire : trouver un accord amiable sur ce dossier et le cloturer, ou bien faire une demande d'arbitrage.

data.name: Error2
data.value: An error occurred while processing your request.

data.name: FirstID
data.value: You will first enter your identification information and those of your opponent.

data.name: LawyerOptional
data.value: You will also have the opportunity to declare a lawyer if you wish.

data.name: LockedOut2
data.value: This account has been locked out, please try again later.

data.name: OnceStatementFinished1
data.value: Once your statement is complete, you can save it to come back to it later or send it to the opposing party.

data.name: OnceStatementFinished2
data.value: He will be able to challenge your statement of claims on the platform. Then starts an exchange phase between you which can lead to an amicable agreement.

data.name: OnceStatementFinished3
data.value: This amicable phase is totally free, for yourself and the opposing party.

data.name: OnceStatementFinished4
data.value: At this stage, no arbitrator has been nominated and no costs have been incurred.

data.name: OneEventFilledOut
data.value: one event has been filled out

data.name: Open
data.value: open. You must end each of them to move on to the next step.

data.name: OpenFreeExchangePhase
data.value: Open the free debate phase between the parties

data.name: StatementInstructions1
data.value: Then comes your statement. You will explain simply your dispute.

data.name: StatementInstructions2
data.value: You will then detail the facts and upload the documents you find useful.

data.name: SummaryPage1
data.value: Your are at the moment on the summary page of the case.

data.name: SummaryPage2
data.value: On this page you can find the information that

data.name: SummaryPage3
data.value: has given us. You will first find the general summary of the case (number and parties).

data.name: SummaryPage4
data.value: Below you will find each parties' declarations, yours being still greyed while you have not gone on to the next stage.

data.name: SummaryPage5
data.value: After your declarations, you will find a timeline of the facts and documents of the case. Reread carefully everything, this timeline is essential for a good understanding of the situation.

data.name: SummaryPage6
data.value: If you wish to respond to this case and potentially challenge parts of the statement, click on the button "Challenge the declaration"

data.name: SummaryPage7
data.value: at the top of the page.

data.name: Welcome1
data.value: has declared a dispute on our FastArbitre platform. This person has asked us to inform you of his declaration. At this stage it is a purely amicable phase, free and confidential. No arbitrator has been nominated.
data.comment: a déclaré un litige sur notre plateforme FastArbitre. Cette personne nous a demandé de vous en informer. A ce stade, il s’agit d’une phase purement amiable, gratuite et confidentielle. Aucun arbitre n’est saisi.

data.name: Welcome2
data.value: wishes to resolve this dispute amicably. FastArbitre has allowed him to detail it.
data.comment: souhaite trouver avec vous la possibilité de résoudre son litige à l’amiable. FastArbitre lui a permis de l’exposer précisément, en vous présentant succinctement ce que cette personne vous reproche et ce qu’elle vous demande. ??? [Pas claire]

data.name: Welcome3
data.value: We will now quickly show you what will follow.
data.comment: Nous allons maintenant rapidement vous montrer ce qui va suivre.

data.name: YourClaimsInstructions1
data.value: Finally, you will indicate what you expect from your opponent.

data.name: YourClaimsInstructions2
data.value: You will fill in as many requests as you want and justify them all.
